div.head: Description of changes for 2012.12
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from the a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor mansucript. A transcription of the Sorbonne text still needs to be completed. Corrections and additions will be added after a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Corrections also need to be made to sections headings. Troublesome transcriptions have been marked as unclear. References to most name and title elements have been added. Some cross-references have already been added. Other citations and a critical apparatus still await construction.
